r.s: Renderer driver that generates a XML string
r.d: This is a Renderer driver for Structures_DataGrid that generates a XML string.
r.n: - the generated XML can now be stored into a file on the local filesystem by setting the new option 'saveToFile' to boolean true - for both writing to the filesystem and sending to the browser, a filename can be specified by setting the new 'filename' option - added support for custom XML attributes - this package is now licensed under the New BSD license
